pages.text: Have you noticed those strange red arconium trees in forest areas? They look like oak trees, but the leaves have a vibrant, red color with a hint of gold. I saw the leprechauns chop these down and collect tree roots. These roots by themselves don't do much, but the master magician used them in rituals to give them magic abilities.

These enchanted tree roots somehow influence what items are flung out of the pot of gold. Most of the rituals require this colorful metal-like material called arconium. Getting your hands on this stuff requires a few steps, the first of which is figuring out how to make arconium essence.
